title: minerjones

content: LOT 1,2,3: 2021 1HodlClub 1oz silver/gilt ingotLot 1 - #139: https://mempool.space/address/1ozBTCUuGxq8kpXtPS9BhGaYEuHXaPKK3Lot 2 - #142: https://mempool.space/address/1ozBTCkiDJXndsdYTWrRpMzQPEFB1Z81aLot 3 - #144: https://mempool.space/address/1ozBTCBJGj5UJ8KsuorzaSznRahm6mKzZSTARTING BID PER BAR: 0.0050BTCLOT 4: 2022 1HodlClub 1 Year Edition Moon Pass #13/50https://mempool.space/address/1MoonxDsSTp9HUWDXmgakfaaF72t8i6Z1BSTARTING BID: 0.0141BTCLOT 5: 2022 1Hodlclub Genesis 5oz silver/gilt ingot #40/50*bar is wrapped in plastic under the capsule*https://mempool.space/address/1GENESiS3snuj8JWjN7Ci6uP1FjRKuFPmhSTARTING BID: 0.0400BTCLOT 6: 2022 1Hodlclub Genesis silver/gilt coin #0090https://mempool.space/address/1ozGenBT8xrjixuXfAoo3rtYQBQU7uqMrSTARTING BID: 0.0040BTCSTARTING BID PER LOT: SEE ABOVEMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0002BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: SEPTEMBER 14th, 2023, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: NOT DISCLOSED

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: not sure when I missed the moon pass pieces - I thought original moon pass holders got  the option to buy so they could have matching - I must have missed that.
